title: May 23rd - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: May 23rd - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian family update, Johnny Depp & Amber Heard trial, Cara Delavingne & Megan Thee Stallion, + Neil Patrick Harris Scandal
description:
This week, the basic and the brain are finally back state side and are talking through a wide range of topics, from providing our usual Kardashian family update (given the Kravis wedding this weekend) to discussing the strange behavior exhibited by Cara Delavingne during the BBMAs. See below for the topics of the week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker Wedding (one, two and three)
  • Kourtney's kids absence from Kravis engagement party as well as second wedding in Santa Barbra
  • People Are Sad for Kendall Jenner’s “Lack of Basic Life Skills” After Her Inability to slice a Cucumber


Amber Heard versus Johnny Depp Continues

  • Amber Heard’s Attorney, Elaine, Get’s Sympathy


Cara Delavingne & Megan Thee Stallion

  • Azealia Banks Just Dragged Megan Thee Stallion For “Using” Cara Delevingne After She Cropped Her Out Of A Photo Following Her Bizarre Behavior At The Billboard Music Awards


Neil Patrick Harris Scandal

  • The “Disgusting” And “Graphic” Meat Platter Inspired By Amy Winehouse’s Corpse That Neil Patrick Harris Served At A Party Just 3 Months After Her Death Has Resurfaced Online




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
